Public Delegate Sub VBufferUtils.PairManipulator(Of TSrc, TDst)(slot As Integer, src As TSrc, ByRef dst As TDst)
type VBufferUtils.PairManipulator<'Src, 'Dst> = delegate of int * 'Src * -> unit
